group_1.textCenter: I want you to show me your proof.
The evidence that explains why Witches @disappeared, and why they're back now...

group_1.textLeft: [chara:102200:effect_7001_attack01]●△▼◇ー!!

group_1.textRight: You won't hit anything thrashin' around aimlessly @like that!

group_1.textLeft: [surround:1022A01][name:sprite_0:effect_7003_damage02][bgEffect:shakeSmall]○■◎!?

group_1.textRight: I will not let your life be wasted.

group_1.textLeft: [surround:1005A02][name:sprite_0:effect_7003_damage02][bgEffect:shakeLarge]×◎◇★!?!?

group_1.textRight: We found those Witches a lot faster than I expected.

group_1.textLeft: Not bad for a day's worth of investigating.

group_1.textRight: We should ask the others how it went for them.

group_1.textLeft: Yes, let's call a meeting.
I found more Witches than I expected during my investigation, too.

group_1.textRight: Maybe the number just went up because we were @all fighting with each other?
Either way, there's still a lot more Witches than @before...

group_1.textLeft: I've added up the numbers from all of you,
and it shows that there are as many Witches as @before the [textRed:Bloody Tragedy]. Perhaps even more...

group_1.textRight: The problem is the balance between Magical Girls @and Grief Seeds.

group_1.textLeft: Even if we assume that one Grief Seed is good @for two or three recoveries...
To keep all of us going without issue, we're @likely still going to run a little short on them.
We're going to have to manage them efficiently.

group_1.textRight: Hmm, well, we do kill Kyubey on sight in Futatsugi...
Maybe if we stop doin' that, we'd start to see more Witches?

group_1.textLeft: That means we would be dragging more people @into the fate of Magical Girls.
The number of Witches is equal to the number of @Magical Girls who have fallen victim to that fate.
So I am not terribly fond of that idea.

group_1.textRight: But I'd still say it's a good start, if Witches really are coming back.

group_1.textLeft: ...Indeed.

group_1.textRight: Then I guess I can work something out with you.

group_1.textLeft: I would appreciate that.
Do tell.

group_1.textRight: I'm sure you've asked other Ryuugasaki girls to join @up with you as well.
I want all of us to meet with you at once so we can negotiate our terms.

group_1.textLeft: It would be best for everyone to hear everything firsthand to avoid miscommunications later.
Having a discussion in advance sounds good.
We will accept your proposal.
